resources.string: We will check your knowladge of Financial and Banking Awareness!
So don\'t waste your time and let\'s start!
Investing in a load fund is more expensive, but performance is better than no-load funds over the long term.
You\'ve saved $25,000 for a down payment on a house. You plan to buy within a year. Which of the following is the safest place to keep your money?
What\'s the fastest and easiest way to boost your paycheck?
What will help most toward building a good credit history â€” or repairing a bad one?
Pay bills on time and keep credit-cards balances low
Limit applications for new credit and keep old accounts open
Sweet-talk the credit-card company phone rep
Which investment offers the highest growth potential for your long-term goals?

Ashley, age 20, contributes $3,000 per year to an individual retirement account for ten years, then stops, letting her money sit in the account. Adam, age 30, contributes $3,000 each year to an IRA for 35 years. Who will have more money at age 65, assuming they get identical investment returns?
Which financial institutions offer the best returns?
Wealth management services are offered by:
The largest bank in the world in terms of capitalization are not:
The Industrial and Commercial Bank of China
An example of a bank that raises capital for businesses is:
